name: Nextcloud
description: Nextcloud is a self-hosted, open source, and fully-featured cloud storage solution for your personal files, office documents, and photos.
short_desc: Productivity platform that keeps you in control
author: Nextcloud GmbH

form_fields.label: Additional Community Containers
form_fields.hint: Specify space-separated community container names to include. Refer to the community-containers directory for available options.

form_fields.label: Upload Limit
form_fields.hint: Adjust the upload limit as needed. Refer to the Nextcloud documentation: https://github.com/nextcloud/all-in-one#how-to-adjust-the-upload-limit-for-nextcloud

form_fields.label: Max Execution Time
form_fields.hint: Set the maximum execution time in seconds. Refer to Nextcloud documentation: https://github.com/nextcloud/all-in-one#how-to-adjust-the-max-execution-time-for-nextcloud

form_fields.label: PHP Memory Limit
form_fields.hint: Modify the PHP memory limit as required. See Nextcloud documentation: https://github.com/nextcloud/all-in-one#how-to-adjust-the-php-memory-limit-for-nextcloud

form_fields.label: Startup Apps
form_fields.hint: Specify the Nextcloud apps to install on first startup. Separate app names with spaces. Refer to documentation: https://github.com/nextcloud/all-in-one#how-to-change-the-nextcloud-apps-that-are-installed-on-the-first-startup
form_fields.placeholder: deck twofactor_totp tasks calendar contacts notes

form_fields.label: Keep Disabled Apps
form_fields.hint: When set to true, disabled Nextcloud apps will not be uninstalled even if they should be installed. See https://github.com/nextcloud/all-in-one#how-to-keep-disabled-apps.
